title: Pingu
creator_credit: Silvio Mazzola, HiT Entertainment and Trickfilm
brief_description: Pingu is a BAFTA award-winning British-Swiss stop-motion claymated television series created by Otmar Gutmann.

constellations_other.name: Storytime animated
constellations_other.description: Abra Cadabra was the world's first stereoscopic 3D film, but animators and filmmakers had experimented with the technology far earlier and continue to use other older techniques like stop-motion animation.

description: Playful penguin Pingu lives with his family in Antarctica, where he often finds himself caught up in mischievous high jinks with his pal Robby.
description_for_label: Playful penguin Pingu lives with his family in Antarctica, where he often finds himself caught up in mischievous high jinks with his pal Robby.
